Yea, I've updated the links section in this group.

I've added links to my HTML maps, Jesse v.02, and KamiOekaki Forums:
Gladiator.

* * * * *

Please don't flock to Google Groups Beta: Gladiator.  I'm hanging onto
the group there mainly to prevent somebody else from snatching it up.
 Half the functionality we would need isn't there YET.

P.S. if anybody wants a gmail invite, I have 6 available; just email
me privately.
